description:
The MerinoLoft™ Collingwood II Jacket is a stylish reimagining of the classic, everyday puffy jacket thanks to icebreaker’s innovative MerinoLoft™ insulation—a natural and cruelty-free insulation that harnesses the natural benefits of merino wool. The jacket’s woven cotton ripstop shell features a durable, PFC-free water-repellent finish to shed moisture, and the high collar provides added protection in cold weather. The merino lining helps regulate body temperature and resist odors, while front hand pockets and an internal zip pocket secure small essentials.

Three layers of comfort in a lightweight layer, icebreaker MerinoLoft™ has a durable, water-repellent shell filled with natural merino-fiber batting, with a super-soft lining in 100% merino. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker MerinoLoft Collingwood II Jacket - Mens
